channel.title: Atheism
channel.description: I haven't been to church in a long time, which really doesn't matter at all; I [i]used[/i] to be Roman Catholic. I was just walking around outside yesterday and this idea popped into my mind. I was taught that Jesus was God, but then how did he worship God if he was god himself. This can be called into question for other religions as well. I don't believe that there is no higher power, but even if there were, where the hell is it?

item.title: Atheism
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

Chimaera God:

I was taught that Jesus was God, but then how did he worship God if he was god himself.

lots of contradictions like this, they are fun to play with

  1. if god is all-powerful, can he create something more powerful then himself?
  2. if god is all-knowing, why does he change his mind sometimes?
  3. why did god make jesus die to forgive us? why didnt he just forgive us without death, who is god trying to impress?

i love how religious people only accept the science which helps them, for other science, they say “we dont believe in that, we only need our belief in god”
lets say they found jesus’ bones, and examined the DNA to find that jesus has no father, only a mother
would they say “we dont believe in that”, no they wouldn’t, they say “science is proving us right”

if all the evidence in the world pointed towards the existence of god, i would be the first to admit it

Read full topic

item.title: Atheism
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:9, topic:189109”][quote author=Martin link=topic=251958.msg2113913#msg2113913 date=1205703683]

ALALALALALALA! PRAISE ALLAH!

there is no jesus.

I had a taxi driver like you. I was scared of him blowing me up.

I hate all religion. I think it’s bullshit. Does that mean I’m atheist?
[/quote]

K, well that taxi driver made you. So shut up.[/quote]

I dunno what you mean by that. So no.

Read full topic

item.title: Atheism
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

you sound more like an agnostic guy than an atheist, the difference is that someone who’s agnostic doesn’t know whether there’s a higher power or not, whereas an atheist says there is nothing like that
